div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 76 Kyparissia, Messenia, 1892-1893 (592) Burial: c. 327 B.C. Contents: 35 AR Philip II: 4 tetradr. (Amphipolis) Alexander III: 20 lifetime tetradr. (Amphi- polis 15, Tarsus 4, Ace 1) Larissa: 1 dr. Locri Opuntii: 2 triob. Thebes: 1 triob. Histiaea: 1 tetrob. Sicyon: 1 dr.; 5 triob. Disposition: Athens Newell, NNM 3 (1921), 21 pp., illus.
